item.title: 6 Quizzes in 100 Seconds
item.description: This is our report on making quizzes in LiaScript in 100 seconds. Do you know an easier way of creating quizzes with your favorite LMS? Multiple-Choice Single-Choice Matrix Text-Input Selection Gap-Text You can use this this example as a basis for your own course by following this link … Or experiment with it in the LiveEditor below:
